name: nommie
description: Web-based multiplayer version of Nomination Whist

scripts.up:be: if [ -f .dev/be.pid ] && kill -0 $(cat .dev/be.pid) 2>/dev/null; then echo "[backend] already running (pid $(cat .dev/be.pid))" && exit 1; fi; RUST_LOG=${RUST_LOG:-info} cargo run --manifest-path apps/backend/Cargo.toml >> .dev/dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .dev/be.pid && echo "[backend] started pid $(cat .dev/be.pid)"
scripts.up:fe: if [ -f .dev/fe.pid ] && kill -0 $(cat .dev/fe.pid) 2>/dev/null; then echo "[frontend] already running (pid $(cat .dev/fe.pid))" && exit 1; fi; pnpm --filter @nommie/frontend dev >> .dev/dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .dev/fe.pid && echo "[frontend] started pid $(cat .dev/fe.pid)"
scripts.down:be: if [ -f .dev/be.pid ]; then kill $(cat .dev/be.pid) 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f .dev/be.pid; echo "[backend] stopped"; else echo "[backend] no pidfile"; fi
scripts.down:fe: if [ -f .dev/fe.pid ]; then kill $(cat .dev/fe.pid) 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f .dev/fe.pid; echo "[frontend] stopped"; else echo "[frontend] no pidfile"; fi
scripts.status: for s in be fe; do if [ -f .dev/$s.pid ] && kill -0 $(cat .dev/$s.pid) 2>/dev/null; then echo "$s: running (pid $(cat .dev/$s.pid))"; else echo "$s: stopped"; fi; done
scripts.test: dotenvx run -- sh -lc 'export DATABASE_URL=${DATABASE_URL}_test; cargo test --manifest-path apps/backend/Cargo.toml -- --nocapture'
scripts.db:pg_isready: dotenvx run -- sh -lc 'docker exec -it nommie-postgres pg_isready -U $POSTGRES_USER -d $POSTGRES_DB'
scripts.db:psql: dotenvx run -- sh -lc 'docker exec -e PGPASSWORD="$POSTGRES_PASSWORD" -it nommie-postgres psql -U $POSTGRES_USER -d $POSTGRES_DB'
scripts.db:migrate: dotenvx run -- sh -lc 'DATABASE_URL=postgres://nommie_owner:${NOMMIE_OWNER_PASSWORD}@localhost:${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}/nommie cargo run --manifest-path apps/backend/migration/Cargo.toml -- up'
scripts.db:fresh: dotenvx run -- sh -lc 'DATABASE_URL=postgres://nommie_owner:${NOMMIE_OWNER_PASSWORD}@localhost:${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}/nommie cargo run --manifest-path apps/backend/migration/Cargo.toml -- fresh'
scripts.db:fresh:test: dotenvx run -- sh -lc 'DATABASE_URL=postgres://nommie_owner:${NOMMIE_OWNER_PASSWORD}@localhost:${POSTGRES_PORT:-5432}/nommie_test cargo run --manifest-path apps/backend/migration/Cargo.toml -- fresh'
